website_summaries.verdict: A strong changing station that lives up to its maximum weight limit.
pros: Well-constructed and can take heavy weight or pressure up to 200 pounds
Two bag hooks for holding diaper bags and supplies
Polypropylene body resists odors and is easy to clean
Comes with hardware for wood stud installation
cons: If you have metal studs, you'll need to buy additional hardware

customer_reviews.title: Bought it too late, but works great.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I bought it for my Church, because they didn't have a changing station in the men's room. I figured I'd just buy it and drop it off for them. Worked out alright. Only downside is that my son started potty training a few weeks later, so it will be awhile before I really get to use it much. Having said that, it seems very good quality, and I got it at a good price. As my son is big, it felt sturdy the few times we did use it. It's mounted to a cinder block wall.
customer_reviews.author: Farmer Pete

customer_reviews.title: Defacto standard of Baby Changing Stations
customer_reviews.text: We only needed two. Given their placement in airports and other public places, we knew this would work for us and did not want to risk another brand (even though several were less expensive.) The instructions are well written and specific. The mounting design is well thought out and easy to do. Great branding by the company, along with good engineering and mounting explanation to back it up.
customer_reviews.author: rg60

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Had two places to hang things
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Had two places to hang things, like a purse or a diaper bag. Even a place for wipes that you can lock! Easy to put up. Like I said, Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Doris C.

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation. Very popular in our church bathroom
customer_reviews.text: Right item, quick shipping. Easy installation. Very popular in our church bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Ronh

customer_reviews.title: Super easy install
customer_reviews.text: Well made, great design. Most manufacturers don't set mounting distances at standard stud measurements. This one does making for an easy sturdy installation. Put one in my Elks Lodge, works great!
customer_reviews.author: Andy D

customer_reviews.title: Buy American
customer_reviews.text: Well made. I like the fact that it is American made and that was one of the reasons my contractor suggested it. He's installed many changing stations and this is the only one he likes enough to recommend. They fold up and down nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley S. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great acquisition
customer_reviews.text: As a mother and restaurant owner I recommend this brand specific changer. It makes changing diapers in public bathroom easy. My only recommendation is to hire a contractor to do the installation for safety reasons.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to install. Comes with hardware
customer_reviews.text: Week one seems to work as advertised. Easy to install. Sturdy. Comes with instructions and hardware.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Other than more expensive than I would have liked to spend, this changing table is great. It is very sturdy and only took 20 minutes to install. Simple instructions and simply put together. This product does not come with a pad, but does have some disposable cloths and it is very easy to clean.

customer_reviews.title: Key is taped to outside edge of unit.
customer_reviews.text: Great price. Easy to install. I tried to use the key that was in the box, but it didn't work and I thought they sent the wrong key. While explaining this to the client, he pointed out there was a key taped to the outside edge of the unit. Of course that one worked. Oops

customer_reviews.title: Koala Kare Baby Changing Station
customer_reviews.text: Quality seems ok. It installed on the wall with no problems, I would firmly recommend as the instructions state to catch studs in the wall and not hang on sheetrock. However the 4 little screws that hold the disposable covers dispenser were useless,had to get 4 self tapping screws, the ones that came with it would not catch and screw in. Not a big deal, was just annoying. It seems strong and durable. Would buy again. Was also delivered timely, no problems.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what it is supposed to be
customer_reviews.text: Well-built, sturdy. I installed it in a church bathroom and my daughter uses it every week for my grandkids. It requires a studded wall with 16-inch spacing, if your walls are different this may not install for you unless you reconstruct the wall. You can't install it with anchors, only by screwing it directly into studs. And take note, it's really hard to drive the screws into the studs with a screwdriver or standard power drill/driver, even if you drill a pilot hole. Plan to have an impact driver on hand to torque the screws down the last few turns.
customer_reviews.author: StrongDreams

customer_reviews.title: Right product right price
customer_reviews.text: These baby changing stations are perfect for our bathrooms in the church. They are the right size for our wall space.

However, this item was placed in the box dirty! I suggest the company take more care in protecting NEW items from getting dirty as to prevent this in the future.

product_meta.title: Koala Kare KB20000 Horizontal Baby Changing Station, 35 3/16 x 22 1/4, Cream
product_meta.description:
Color:CreamBaby changing station body shall be durable, injection-molded polypropylene. Design of unit shall be surface mounted. Unit shall be equipped with a pneumatic cylinder for controlled opening and closing of bed. Bed shall be secured to metal mounting chassis with a concealed steel-on-steel hinge. No hinge structure shall be exposed on interior or exterior surfaces. Unit shall have mounting hardware included. Unit shall have Microban antimicrobial embedded into plastic material on the changing surface. Unit shall comply with ADA regulations when properly installed. Bed shall have smooth concave changing area with a nylon safety strap and two hooks for bags or purses. The design and manufacture of Koala products is intended to be compliant with the 2010 ADA standards for accessible design and the 2009 ICC A117.1, accessible and usable buildings and facilities. Unit shall conform to ASTM F 2285-04 standard safety performance specification for diaper changing tables for commercial use, ANSI Z535.4 product safety signs and labels, EN 12221:2008, ASTM G22 antibacterial standards or local code if more stringent installation requirements are applicable for barrier-free accessibility. Unit shall have a built-in liner dispenser for use with 3-p!y chemical free biodegradable bed liners, instructional graphics and safety messages in 4 languages. Optional braille label is available. Unit shall be backed by manufacturer's 5-year limited warranty on materials and workmanship and include a provision for replacement caused by vandalism. Unit shall be manufactured in the USA Depth (closed) 4" (100mm). Extension (open) 22-1/2" (570mm).

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Baby changing station body shall be durable, injection-molded polypropylene. Design of unit shall be surface-mounted. Unit shall be equipped with pneumatic cylinder for controlled opening and closing of bed.
feature_bullets: Koala Polypropylene surface mounted horizontal baby changing station. Bed surface exclusively contains Microban antimicrobial, reducing odor causing bacteria.
Unibody steel chassis supports 200 lbs with minimal deflection.
Steel on steel hinge has greater resistance to wear and improved durability.
Fully ASTM and EN compliant. TUV Certification. Meets all ADA requirements when properly installed.
Dual liner cavity with lock minimizes operator refills and discourages potential vandalism.
